00032 affx::File5_Matrix::File5_Matrix()
00033 {
00034   m_kind_char='M';
00035   init();
00036 }
00037 
00038 //
00039 affx::File5_Matrix::~File5_Matrix()
00040 {
00041   close();
00042 }
00043 
00044 int affx::File5_Matrix::init() 
00045 {
00046   File5_Object::init();
00047   //
00048   m_kind=FILE5_KIND_MATRIX;
00049   m_kind_char='M';
00050   //
00051   m_rank=0;
00052   //
00053   return 0;
00054 }
00055 
00056 int affx::File5_Matrix::flush() 
00057 {
00058   if (m_state!=affx::FILE5_STATE_OPEN) {
00059     return 0;
00060   }
00061     
00062   return 0;
00063 }
00064 
00065 char affx::File5_Matrix::file5_kind_char() {
00066   return 'M';
00067 }

00069 /////
00070 
00071 int
00072 affx::File5_Matrix::open(const std::string& name,
00073                          const affx::File5_dtype_t& dtype,
00074                          const std::vector<int> dims,
00075                          int flags)
00076 {
00077   close();
00078   //parent_refcnt_inc();
00079   //
00080   m_name=name;
00081   m_flags=flags;
00082   m_dtype=dtype;
00083   m_h5_dtype=as_hdf5_dtype(dtype);
00084   // copy from int to hsize_t
00085   affx::file5_dims_hsize_copy(m_dims,dims);
00086   m_rank=m_dims.size();
00087   FILE5_ASSERT(m_rank>0);
00088 
00089   if (getParent()->name_exists(name)==1) {
00090     FILE5_ABORT(": name exists: '"+name+"'");
00091   }
00092 
00093   //
00094   // affx::File5_Object::open();
00095 
00096   //
00097   hid_t h5_cparms;
00098   std::vector<hsize_t> chunk_dims;
00099   chunk_dims.resize(m_rank,100);
00100   h5_cparms=H5Pcreate(H5P_DATASET_CREATE);
00101   // chunk the data
00102   m_h5_status=H5Pset_chunk(h5_cparms,m_rank,&chunk_dims[0]);
00103   // turn on crc checks.
00104   if (m_opt_crc==1) {
00105     m_h5_status=H5Pset_fletcher32(h5_cparms);
00106   }
00107 
00108   std::vector<hsize_t> dims_max;
00109   dims_max.resize(m_rank,H5S_UNLIMITED);
00110 
00111   m_h5_dspace=H5Screate_simple(m_rank,&m_dims[0],&dims_max[0]);
00112   m_h5_obj=H5Dcreate(h5_parent_id(),
00113                       m_name.c_str(),
00114                       m_h5_dtype,
00115                       m_h5_dspace,
00116                       h5_cparms);
00117   FILE5_CHECKID(m_h5_obj,"H5Dcreate");
00118 
00119   //
00120   set_file5_kind_string("file5-matrix");
00121   
00122   //
00123   m_h5_status=H5Pclose(h5_cparms);
00124   m_dirty=1;
00125   m_state=affx::FILE5_STATE_OPEN;
00126   return 0;
00127 }
00128 
00129 int affx::File5_Matrix::close() 
00130 {
00131   flush();
00132   //
00133   affx::File5_Object::close();
00134   //
00135   return 0;
00136 }
00137 
00138 int
00139 affx::File5_Matrix::resize(const std::vector<int>& dims)
00140 {
00141   // convert to the hsize_t
00142   std::vector<hsize_t> dims_cpy;
00143   affx::file5_dims_hsize_copy(dims_cpy,dims);
00144   //
00145   m_h5_status=H5Dextend(m_h5_obj,&dims_cpy[0]);
00146   FILE5_CHECKRV(m_h5_status,"H5Dextend");
00147 
00148   return 0;
00149 }

00151 //////////
00152 
00153 int
00154 affx::File5_Matrix::set_void(const std::vector<int>& dims,void* val_ptr)
00155 {
00156   // the memory dspace
00157   FILE5_DIM1(m_dims,   1);
00158   FILE5_DIM1(m_offset, 0);
00159   FILE5_DIM1(m_count,  1);
00160 
00161   hid_t m_dspace=H5Screate_simple(1,m_dims,NULL);
00162   H5Sselect_hyperslab(m_dspace,H5S_SELECT_SET,m_offset,NULL,m_count,NULL);
00163 
00164   // the file dspace
00165   std::vector<hsize_t> f_offset;
00166   affx::file5_dims_hsize_copy(f_offset,dims);
00167   std::vector<hsize_t> f_count;
00168   f_count.resize(m_rank,1);
00169 
00170   hid_t f_dspace=H5Dget_space(m_h5_obj);
00171   H5Sselect_hyperslab(f_dspace,H5S_SELECT_SET,&f_offset[0],NULL,&f_count[0],NULL);
00172   //
00173   m_h5_status=H5Dwrite(m_h5_obj,m_h5_dtype,m_dspace,f_dspace,H5P_DEFAULT,val_ptr);
00174   FILE5_CHECKRV(m_h5_status,"H5Dwrite");
00175   //
00176   H5Sclose(m_dspace);
00177   H5Sclose(f_dspace);
00178   //
00179   return 0;
00180 }
00181 
00182 int
00183 affx::File5_Matrix::set(const std::vector<int>& dims,int val)
00184 {
00185   File5_type_pun_t pun;
00186   pun.i=val;
00187   return set_void(dims,(void*)&pun);
00188 }
00189 int
00190 affx::File5_Matrix::set(const std::vector<int>& dims,float val)
00191 {
00192   File5_type_pun_t pun;
00193   pun.f=val;
00194   return set_void(dims,(void*)&pun);
00195 }
00196 int
00197 affx::File5_Matrix::set(const std::vector<int>& dims,double val)
00198 {
00199   File5_type_pun_t pun;
00200   pun.d=val;
00201   return set_void(dims,(void*)&pun);
00202 }

00206 int
00207 affx::File5_Matrix::get_void(const std::vector<int>& dims,void* val_ptr)
00208 {
00209   // the memory dspace
00210   FILE5_DIM1(m_dims,   1);
00211   FILE5_DIM1(m_offset, 0);
00212   FILE5_DIM1(m_count,  1);
00213 
00214   hid_t m_dspace=H5Screate_simple(1,m_dims,NULL);
00215   H5Sselect_hyperslab(m_dspace,H5S_SELECT_SET,m_offset,NULL,m_count,NULL);
00216 
00217   // the file dspace
00218   std::vector<hsize_t> f_offset;
00219   affx::file5_dims_hsize_copy(f_offset,dims);
00220   std::vector<hsize_t> f_count;
00221   f_count.resize(m_rank,1);
00222 
00223   hid_t f_dspace=H5Dget_space(m_h5_obj);
00224   H5Sselect_hyperslab(f_dspace,H5S_SELECT_SET,&f_offset[0],NULL,&f_count[0],NULL);
00225 
00226   //
00227   m_h5_status=H5Dread(m_h5_obj,m_h5_dtype,m_dspace,f_dspace,H5P_DEFAULT,val_ptr);
00228   FILE5_CHECKRV(m_h5_status,"H5Dread");
00229   
00230   //
00231   return 0;
00232 }

00234 int
00235 affx::File5_Matrix::get(const std::vector<int>& dims,int* val)
00236 {
00237   return get_void(dims,(void*)val);
00238 }

00240 affx::File5_Matrix::get(const std::vector<int>& dims,float* val)

00242   return get_void(dims,(void*)val);

00244 int
00245 affx::File5_Matrix::get(const std::vector<int>& dims,double* val)

00247   return get_void(dims,(void*)val);
